articles.title: US warships patrol South China Sea after two Chinese ships collide
articles.description: The US has deployed two warships in the South China Sea following a collision between Chinese ships and a Philippine vessel, raising concerns about maritime safety in the disputed waters.

articles.title: 2-1 judgment: Appeals court allows Trump admin to cut billions in foreign aid; overturns lower court ruling
articles.description: A US federal appeals court ruled that the Trump administration can proceed with cuts to foreign assistance programs, overturning a lower court's decision that would have restored the funds.

articles.title: Protesters Demand Justice for Anas al-Sharif and Other Journalists Assassinated by Israel
articles.description: Worldwide protests and vigils are calling for accountability following the targeted assassination of Al Jazeera correspondent Anas al-Sharif and his colleagues by Israeli forces in Gaza City.
